sources.title: Miss Robin Hood
sources.description: Title: Miss Robin Hood Summary: Henry Wrigley is happy writing stories for a children's' comic. Then he meets Miss Honey, who encourages him to go into minor crime. Directed by: John Guillermin. Actors: Margaret Rutherford, Richard Hearne, Edward Lexy Production Company: Group 3 Release Date: 8 June 1953 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White Henry Wrigley is happy writing stories for a children's' comic. Then he meets Miss Honey, who encourages him to go into minor crime.

sources.title: Missrobinhood
sources.description: “Zaney, innocent fun” “Decidedly odd” “A must see movie” (IMDB reviews quotes). A dotty old fan of a children’s comic book ropes its straight-laced author into taking part in a madcap crime caper. Margaret Rutherford and Richard Hearne lead a solid cast. Good production values. Recommended screwball fun. IMDB rating 6.2. Directed by John Guillermin. Released in 1952 (UK). Complete print.

metadata.Plot: Henry Wrigley (Richard Hearne) is happy writing stories for a children's' comic. Then he meets Miss Honey (Dame Margaret Rutherford), who encourages him to go into minor crime.
metadata.Writer: Reed De Rouen, Geoffrey Orme, Val Valentine
